final_mermaid_code:
flowchart TD
    A[Application received] --> B[Check completeness]
    B --> C{ParallelGateway}
    C --> D[Check credit history]
    C --> E[Check income sources]
    D --> F{ParallelGateway}
    E --> F
    F --> G[Assess application]
    G --> H{XORGateway}
    H -->|granted| I[Make credit offer]
    H -->|denied| J[Notify rejection]
    I --> K{XORGateway}
    J --> K
    K --> L[Application processed]
